name: Warehouse 101
description:
This is a game created in Godot for 101 hours game jam.

You ara working in a warehouse, but the floor is covered with ice. 

Your goal is to move boxes to places marked with orange cross.

Game can be played on android, or you can use:

ARROWS  - to move and push boxes

SPACE - to open doors

R - restart level

S - show all levels

---

This is my 1st game jam, and 1st finished game.

Unfortunetly i didnt have enough time to add music and sound.

The game has 10 levels, some easier, some a little bit harder...

If you find any bugs or have suggestions, pls let me know and maybe i will make an update once the jam is over.

Thanks
